title: Trump embraces gas guzzlers and air pollution by weakening fuel economy standards
description: President Donald Trump announced a new plan that lets carmakers pollute more by making less fuel efficient vehicles. The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) said today that it’ll roll back fuel economy rules finalized last year by the Biden…
content: The Trump administration proposed a major rollback of fuel economy standards it has effectively already stopped enforcing. The Trump administration proposed a m… [+5670 chars]
